item.title: Slots Script
item.dc:creator: @yakman yakman
item.description:
@yakman wrote:

use SCARs exception handling too

[scar]
var
s: integer;

try
s:= StrToInt(ReadLn(‘type a number’));
except
writeln(‘the typed line was not a number’);
end
[/scar]

the way it works is that the code between ‘try’ and ‘except’ is run normally
if there is a runtime error, the script will Not stop, it will run the code between ‘except’ and ‘end’
if everything goes normally and there is no runtime error, the script will skip the code between ‘except’ and ‘end’ and run the stuff after it

Read full topic

item.title: Slots Script
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

Run this code and you’ll understand the trim thing.

program New;

const
  Text = '           This text will be trimmed!              ';

begin
  ClearDebug;
  WriteLn('"'+Trim(Text)+'"');
end.

Read full topic

item.title: Slots Script
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

When you trim a function, it removes the white spaces in the beginning of the string and at the end. Example:

Trim(Text);

Read full topic

item.title: Slots Script
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

If you type in nothing for the ReadLn function and hit OK or you just click on Cancel, then you get a runtime error. Make sure to check if there is something in there. Trim it too.

Very nice script man. This is really creative!

Read full topic

item.title: Slots Script
item.dc:creator: @deathbyvirus deathbyvirus
item.description:
@deathbyvirus wrote:

Lately i’ve been bord and just making random scripts and i made this game its pretty basic, took about 1-2 hours to make, anyways its not hard to learn i’m pretty sure all instructions are in the script, you just gota put it into scar and then press play, anyways enjoy!

[code]
Program Slots;

Var
Slot1, Slot2, Slot3, Bet, PlayAgain : String;
Money : Integer;

Procedure Scores;
Begin
Writeln(’! x 1 = 2 | % % % = 25’)
Writeln(’! x 2 = 5 | ^ ^ ^ = 30’)
Writeln(’! ! ! = 10 | & & & = 50’)
Writeln(’@ @ @ = 15 | * * * = 100’)
Writeln(’# # # = 20 | $ $ $ = 500’)
Writeln(’’)
End;

Procedure Betting;
Begin
Repeat
Bet := Readln(‘How much are you betting? Type “all in” to bet all your money. Current money: $’ + IntToStr(money))
If(Bet = ‘all in’)Then
Bet := IntToStr(Money)
Until((StrToInt(Bet) < Money + 1) and (StrToInt(Bet) > 0))
End;

Procedure Spin;
Begin
Case Random(8) Of
0: Slot1 := ‘!’
1: Slot1 := ‘@’
2: Slot1 := ‘#’
3: Slot1 := ‘%’
4: Slot1 := ‘^’
5: Slot1 := ‘&’
6: Slot1 := ‘’
7: Slot1 := ‘$’
End;
Case Random(8) Of
0: Slot2 := ‘!’
1: Slot2 := ‘@’
2: Slot2 := ‘#’
3: Slot2 := ‘%’
4: Slot2 := ‘^’
5: Slot2 := ‘&’
6: Slot2 := '’
7: Slot2 := ‘$’
End;
Case Random(8) Of
0: Slot3 := ‘!’
1: Slot3 := ‘@’
2: Slot3 := ‘#’
3: Slot3 := ‘%’
4: Slot3 := ‘^’
5: Slot3 := ‘&’
6: Slot3 := ‘*’
7: Slot3 := ‘$’
End;
Writeln('Spin : ’ + Slot1 + ‘|’ + Slot2 + ‘|’ + Slot3)
End;

Procedure Winnings;
Begin
If((Slot1 = ‘!’) Or (Slot2 = ‘!’) Or (Slot3 = ‘!’))Then
Money := Money + StrToInt(Bet) + StrToInt(Bet)*2
If(((Slot1 = ‘!’) And (Slot2 = ‘!’)) Or ((Slot1 = ‘!’) And (Slot3 = ‘!’)) Or ((Slot2 = ‘!’) And (Slot3 = ‘!’)))Then
Money := Money + StrToInt(Bet) + StrToInt(Bet)*5
If((Slot1 = ‘!’) And (Slot2 = ‘!’) And (Slot3 = ‘!’))Then
Money := Money + StrToInt(Bet) + StrToInt(Bet)*10
If((Slot1 = ‘@’) And (Slot2 = ‘@’) And (Slot3 = ‘@’))Then
Money := Money + StrToInt(Bet) + StrToInt(Bet)*15
If((Slot1 = ‘#’) And (Slot2 = ‘#’) And (Slot3 = ‘#’))Then
Money := Money + StrToInt(Bet) + StrToInt(Bet)*20
If((Slot1 = ‘%’) And (Slot2 = ‘%’) And (Slot3 = ‘%’))Then
Money := Money + StrToInt(Bet) + StrToInt(Bet)25
If((Slot1 = ‘^’) And (Slot2 = ‘^’) And (Slot3 = ‘^’))Then
Money := Money + StrToInt(Bet) + StrToInt(Bet)30
If((Slot1 = ‘&’) And (Slot2 = ‘&’) And (Slot3 = ‘&’))Then
Money := Money + StrToInt(Bet) + StrToInt(Bet)50
If((Slot1 = '’) And (Slot2 = '’) And (Slot3 = '’))Then
Money := Money + StrToInt(Bet) + StrToInt(Bet)*100
If((Slot1 = ‘$’) And (Slot2 = ‘$’) And (Slot3 = ‘$’))Then
Money := Money + StrToInt(Bet) + StrToInt(Bet)*500
Else
Money := Money - StrToInt(Bet)
End;

Begin
Repeat
Money := 100;
ClearDebug;
Scores;
Repeat
Betting;
ClearDebug;
Scores;
Spin;
Winnings;
Until(Money = 0);
PlayAgain := Readln(‘You took your chances and lost, because you have no money left, you’ + chr(39) + ‘ve been kicked out of the Casino. Play again?’);
Until(PlayAgain = ‘no’);
Cleardebug;
Wait(1000)
Writeln(‘Thank you for playing’)
Writeln(’’)
Wait(1500)
Writeln(‘Made by DeathByVirus’)
Writeln(’’)
Writeln(’’)
Writeln(’’)
Writeln(’’)
Wait(2000)
End.
[\code][/code]
